category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMGTCInsertConnectionCodeAttributeIDs
preference.preference_description: Defines the IDs of the Generic Tool Catalog (GTC) class attributes that hold ISO insert connection codes for a catalog component. The default values are -150165, -151241, -151242, -151243 and -151244. Those connection codes will be converted from ISO to DIN, when the ICO is mapped into another class.
